description: The CompassVPN Dashboard offers real-time monitoring of VPN infrastructure, with server metrics, Xray traffic, and config management. Track resources, connections, bandwidth, and security in one place.

panels.description: List of all instances and their corresponding information within the time range.
panels.title: Overview

panels.description: Total Network Usage for each instance and its network interface.
panels.title: Total Network Usage

panels.description: Number of unique users actively connected to the server. (Approximately)
panels.title: Active Unique Users

panels.description: Approximation of current unique users for the last 2 minutes.
panels.title: Current Unique Users

panels.description: Total number of connections established over time. This includes all connection attempts, including reconnections.
panels.title: Total Connection Count

panels.description: Average number of connections per unique user.
panels.title: Connections per User

panels.description: Number of requests blocked by routing rules over time period.
panels.title: Blocked Requests

panels.description: Percentage of requests that are blocked by routing rules.
panels.title: Blocked Requests Percentage

title: CompassVPN Dashboard
